div.em: Current conditions as of 24 Apr 05:53 am MDT

td.span: A 50 percent chance of showers. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 57. Breezy, with a north wind 15 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 33 mph.
A 20 percent chance of showers after midnight. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 33. Breezy, with a north wind 6 to 15 mph becoming west northwest after midnight. Winds could gust as high as 24 mph.
A 20 percent chance of showers. Mostly sunny, with a high near 60. West northwest wind 8 to 10 mph becoming north in the morning. Winds could gust as high as 16 mph.
